```{r}

library(tidyverse)


```



```{r}

df <- read_csv(file = "SPACE/Large50/data_wt2.csv")
#df
fit <- lm(bytes ~ n, data=df)
#summary(fit)
coef(fit)

ggplot(df, aes(x = n, y = bytes)) + 
  geom_point() +
  stat_smooth(method = "lm") +
  theme_classic()


```
